name: Public Storage, Inc.
description: Public Storage, Inc. is a leading provider of self-storage solutions, managing a vast portfolio of storage facilities across the United States and Europe. Founded in 1972, Public Storage has established itself as a trusted name in the self-storage industry, focusing on providing customers with a convenient and secure place to store their belongings. The company operates thousands of storage locations, offering a variety of unit sizes and features, including climate-controlled spaces, vehicle storage, and 24-hour access. Public Storage emphasizes customer service and accessibility, with online reservation options and a user-friendly mobile app that allows customers to manage their accounts easily. The company is committed to maintaining high standards of cleanliness and safety at its facilities, ensuring a positive experience for all customers. As one of the largest self-storage companies globally, Public Storage continues to innovate and expand its services, capitalizing on the growing demand for storage solutions driven by urbanization, downsizing, and the increasing trend of e-commerce. With a strong financial position and a strategic focus on growth, Public Storage is well-positioned to meet the evolving needs of its customers in an ever-changing market.

seo.meta_title: Public Storage, Inc. | Leading Self-Storage Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Public Storage, Inc., a leader in self-storage solutions with thousands of locations. Discover our variety of units and commitment to customer service.

faq.question: What services does Public Storage offer?
faq.answer: Public Storage offers self-storage units, climate-controlled storage, and moving supplies.

faq.question: Where is Public Storage headquartered?
faq.answer: Public Storage is headquartered in Glendale, California, USA.

faq.question: How can I reserve a storage unit?
faq.answer: You can reserve a storage unit online through the Public Storage website or mobile app.

faq.question: What types of storage units are available?
faq.answer: Public Storage provides standard units, climate-controlled units, and vehicle storage options.
